title: Avalanche

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever a player is roleblocked by anything other than an Everfrost attribute, the player directly beneath them in the player list (including dead players) is roleblocked as well.
- Roleblock immune.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player each night. If they were roleblocked last night by your attribute, roleblock them again.
